highlightsList.text: Covers everything need to get Shoko Server installed and running on Windows.
Covers everything need to get Shoko Server installed and running on Linux.
Covers everything need to get Shoko Desktop installed and running on Windows.
Covers everything need to get Shoko Metadata installed and running on Plex.
Covers everything need to get My Anime 3 installed and running on MediaPortal.
Covers how to use Shoko Server's Web UI and what each function/setting does.
Information on accessing Shoko's API and what endpoints are available.
Always a good place to check if you run into an issue or looking for general information.
Details about what's been added, changed, fixed and removed for the various programs/plugins.
